parser
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  parser.Parser

public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

A simple parser, which will execute Pascal-like statements as it parses them.

Version:
9/23/17
Author:
Sparsh Chauhan

parseStatement

public ast.Statement parseStatement()
                             throws scanner.ScanErrorException
Parses a statement, which could be a series of tokens. Parses from BEGIN to END. Also parses IF THEN statements.

Throws:
scanner.ScanErrorException
Returns:
A object of one of Statement's subclasses.
